overview:
Eric Huet joined Ventech in 2000 and is a General Partner. He is driving investments in Software and Web Services sectors. He brings to Ventech portfolio his experience of high growth companies and his expertise in marketing and sales. Since 2008, Eric is based in Hong Kong as President of Ventech China, which he is managing and developing. Eric sits on Board of Viva.

In the 90â€™s, Eric participated actively as a sales manager to the strong development of start-ups and young companies in the Software area, as Business Objects, Natsystems and Uniplex. Then between 1997 and 2000, he co-founded and served as strategy consultant for several software and Internet companies.

Eric Huet graduated from Harvard Business School (GMP) and holds a Ph.D. in Philosophy (Sorbonne, Paris).
